title: Backgrounds
content: the source of the Shadow Curse. Living Legend Accept Jaheira's invitation to talk. Memento Mori Offer condolences to Harper Meygan. Plucking the Lyre's Web Play the Spider's Lyre to attract the drider. Strings of Fate Bring Art his lute. Tales of Yore Piece the scriptures together correctly and reveal the secret in the town square. Town of Shadows Find out the fate of each of the major characters in the town: the brewer, the surgeon, the toll collector and the mason. Catchy Tune Hear the orthon'
